title: 【海底墳墓消失】二戰英軍10艘沉艦 疑被中國海盜「拆骨」撈起當廢鐵賣

replies.msg:
英國《每日郵報》報道，10艘在第二次世界大戰時沉沒的英國軍艦，被中國海盜非法打撈當廢鐵賣。國防大臣韋廉信（Gavin Williamson）要求立即調查。

10艘艦被列為戰爭公墓，是逾1,000名英國水兵安息之所，卻被中國海盜「拆骨」打撈。那些軍艦1941年及42年間在馬來西亞和印尼對開海域被擊沉，包括「威爾斯親王號」戰艦及「反擊號戰鬥巡洋艦」，兩船共載835人。專家表示，兩艦各有至少一半船身被非法撈走。「埃克塞特」號重型巡洋艦更已成艘「消失」。

專家之前表示，6艘英艦被搜掠，如今發現多4艘，而且數目可能還會上升。報道指，從事非法打撈的駁船裝有起重機，由中國公司擁有。不過，懷疑涉事的船公司「福建嘉達」，已否認涉及活動。

軍艦殘骸被撈起後，會先運到印尼，碎成多片後運到中國，再投入全球的鋼材市場。


韋廉信表示，英國政府譴責對含人體遺骸的沉船有任何干擾，強調所有在船上失去生命的人都應得到安息。英國國防部表示正與印尼政府合作，在「埃克塞特」號、「遭遇」號驅逐艦、「伊萊克特拉」號驅逐艦殘骸所在位置周圍建立特別保護區，但又指另外四艘沉艦最近已被海盜睇中，保護工作可謂刻不容緩。

英國《每日郵報》
好撚仆街
出兵去南海了

軍艦殘骸被撈起後，會先運到印尼，碎成多片後運到中國，再投入全球的鋼材市場

replies.msg:
引多段收你皮

Fortunately, this is a problem that’s going away on its own, so the headline is really only appropriate as a great reference to a popular movie. After 1975, testing moved underground, reducing, but not eliminating, the amount of radiation pumped into the air. Since various treaties ending the testing of nuclear weapons, and thanks to the short half-life of some of the radioactive isotopes, the background radiation in the air has been decreasing. Cobalt-60 has a half-life of 5.26 years, which means that steel is getting less and less radioactive on its own (Cobalt-60 from 1945 would now be at .008% of original levels). The newer BOS technique exposes the steel to fewer impurities from the air, too. Eventually the need for special low background steel will be just a memory.

你知唔撚知 lead 係咩撚嘢？

引多段收你皮

Fortunately, this is a problem that’s going away on its own, so the headline is really only appropriate as a great reference to a popular movie. After 1975, testing moved underground, reducing, but not eliminating, the amount of radiation pumped into the air. Since various treaties ending the testing of nuclear weapons, and thanks to the short half-life of some of the radioactive isotopes, the background radiation in the air has been decreasing. Cobalt-60 has a half-life of 5.26 years, which means that steel is getting less and less radioactive on its own (Cobalt-60 from 1945 would now be at .008% of original levels). The newer BOS technique exposes the steel to fewer impurities from the air, too. Eventually the need for special low background steel will be just a memory.

哈 wiki 話你老母係雞呀


Sorry, the market for old steel is now pretty much sunk. Reduced radioactive dust plus sophisticated instrumentation that corrects for background radiation means new steel can now be used in most cases.

There’s some lingering demand for really old maritime metal, though. When researchers at one national lab wanted shielding that emitted no radiation whatsoever, they used lead ballast retrieved from the Spanish galleon San Ignacio, which had been lying on the bottom of the Caribbean for 450 years.
